GSD.description:
NFSD: Protect against send buffer overflow in NFSv2 READ

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 2be9331ca6061bc6ea32247266f45b8b21030244. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: Protect against send buffer overflow in NFSv2 READ
